summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Video Downloader Pro application. All core functionalities working correctly including video analysis, format selection, and download initiation. Backend APIs fully functional with proper error handling. Frontend UI responsive with professional Vietnamese interface.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/status POST/GET - Status check functionality working
Backend API /api/analyze - Successfully analyzes YouTube videos and returns metadata
Backend API /api/download - Initiates video download with proper streaming response
Backend error handling - Properly rejects invalid URLs with 400 status
Frontend page loading - All UI elements render correctly
Frontend URL input and analysis - Successfully processes video URLs
Frontend video info display - Shows title, thumbnail, source, duration, formats
Frontend quality selection - Dropdown works with multiple format options
Frontend download button - Properly enabled/disabled based on selection
Frontend progress tracking - Progress section appears during download
Frontend error handling - Gracefully handles invalid URLs with user feedback
Frontend mobile responsiveness - UI adapts correctly to mobile viewport
Integration flow - Complete workflow from URL input to download initiation works seamlessly
